qa_tools.purpose: Pytest configuration defining test discovery patterns, markers (unit/integration/performance), async support, timeout settings, and coverage options
qa_tools.notes: Reusable pytest configuration pattern. Defines standard test markers (asyncio, unit, integration, performance, skip_without_cli), timeout settings (300s), and output formatting. Could serve as template for other projects.
